memo: If you check this video guidance,it will connect to the database!
title: If you check this video guidance,it will connect to the database!(EN/JP)
description:
This video introduces Mitsubishi Electric MES Interface Unit, which connects sequencer and a database without using a personal computer to collect information from production sites and IT layers.

In this video, we explain how to connect MES Interface Unit and database and how to set up.
We also introduce the advantages of using the MES interface unit.

↓ ↓ ↓ Details of the product ↓ ↓ ↓
https://www.mitsubishielectric.com/fa/products/cnt/plcr/pmerit/it_connect/mes.html

The contents of this video is based on MELSEC iQ-R MES Interface Unit User's Manual (Startup)
8. We make this movie referring to the operation example.

Please refer to the manual for details.
↓ ↓ ↓ ↓ Manual is here ↓ ↓ ↓
https://dl.mitsubishielectric.com/dl/fa/document/manual/plc/sh081422eng/sh081422engk.pdf

We hope this video helps you understand the benefits and setting procedure of MES Interface unit.

▶Chapter
00:00　(1) About MES Interface Module
04:01　(2) System configuration and introduction procedure
07:09　(3) Startup of the server
14:05　(4) Startup of the MES interface module and configuration computer
29:03　(5) Operation check

memo: MELViz iQ PlantSuite "water treatment and social infrastructure solutions" / Mitsubishi Electric
title: MELViz iQ PlantSuite DQwater treatment and social infrastructure solutionsDQ / Mitsubishi Electric
description:
Control and Monitoring System for Social Infrastructure DQMELViz iQ PlantSuiteDQ

Plant management faces various serious challenges. To reduce costs and improve productivity, management supervisors must optimize cost performance and take responsibility to ensure global competitiveness.

Mitsubishi Electric's iQ PlantSuite provides outstanding cost performance solutions with our popular FA devices, power distribution control devices, network devices that connect these devices, and SCADA that monitors the entire system. Mitsubishi Electric is your global partner for plant management system.

memo: FA integrated solution e-F@ctory / FA統合ソリューションe-F@ctory：FA-IT統合を実現する情報連携製品MESインタフェース ((English)/日本語)
title: FA integrated solution e-F@ctory / FA統合ソリューションe-F@ctory：FA-IT統合を実現する情報連携製品MESインタフェース ((English)/日本語)
description:
開発・生産・保守の全般にわたる「TCOの削減」を図ることを最大のコンセプトに、高度な技術と情報を活用し、工場の最適化を図ることで、ものづくりの将来を支えるのがFA統合ソリューション「e-F@ctory」です。e-F@ctoryのキーコンポ－ネントである情報連携製品 MESインタフェースは、シーケンス制御システムとITシステムのデータベースを連携することにより、生産性・品質の向上を実現します。

FA integrated solution DQe-F@ctoryDQ supports manufacturing future by using high technology and information and optimizing a factory to DQreduce TCODQ of development, production, and maintenance as the biggest concept.
The advanced information module MES interface, a key component of e-F@ctory improves productivity and quality by linking the sequence control system and IT system database.

memo: The C contoller of MELSEC iQ-R series / MELSEC iQ-Rシリーズ用C言語コントローラR12CCPU-V ((English)/日本語)
title: The C contoller of MELSEC iQ-R series / MELSEC iQ-Rシリーズ用C言語コントローラR12CCPU-V ((English)/日本語)
description:
MELSEC iQ-Rシリーズ用のC言語コントローラR12CCPU-Vを紹介します。
マルチコアCPUとVxWorksを採用し、高いリアルタイム性が求められる制御が可能です。機器の高速化と高信頼性を求めるお客様に是非ご検討いただきたいソリューションです。
MITSUBISHI ELECTRIC introduces the C controller DQR12CCPU-VDQ for MELSEC iQ-R series.
This C controller employs the multi-core CPU and VxWorks and enables the control requiring high real-time performance.
This solution is for customers who need high speed and high reliability of devices.

memo: Users Voice~iQ-Rシリーズ編~
title: Users Voice~iQ-Rシリーズ編~
description:
iQ-Rご採用いただきました長野オートメーション様よりお客様の生の声として、
インタビューにお答えいただいた動画です。また、弊社名古屋製作所の設計者メンバーから
iQ-Rシリーズの魅力をご紹介させていただきます。　



↓↓↓MELSEC iQ-Rの詳細はコチラ↓↓↓
https://www.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/fa/products/cnt/plcr/items/index.html


↓↓↓長野オートメーション様ホームページはコチラ↓↓↓
https://www.nagano-automation.co.jp/

memo: OPC server for the C controller / C言語コントローラ対応OPCサーバー 株式会社たけびし ((English)/日本語)
title: OPC server for the C controller / C言語コントローラ対応OPCサーバー 株式会社たけびし ((English)/日本語)
description:
OPC（OLE for Process Control）サーバー機能（OPC UAインターフェイス）をC言語コントローラ上で動作させ、タブレット端末や上位サービスからMELSECと直接接続できます。
C言語コントローラをゲートウェイとして活用することで、パソコンを使用せずにICTおよびIoTシステムを構築できます。海外の製造拠点など異なる装置が入り混じった環境で生産現場の見える化を推進したい方にお勧めします。
The OPC (OLE for Process Control) server function (OPC UA interface) can be operated on C controllers and directly connected to MELSEC from tablets or upper-level service.
The ICT and IoT system can be established without a personal computer by using the C controller as a gateway.
We recommend this server to those who would like to visualize production sites in the environment where various devices are mixed such as oversea production sites.

memo: GUI development support environment GENWARE3-VG / GUI開発環境GENWARE3-VGの紹介 株式会社アイ・エル・シー ((English)/日本語)
title: GUI development support environment GENWARE3-VG / GUI開発環境GENWARE3-VGの紹介 株式会社アイ・エル・シー ((English)/日本語)
description: C言語コントローラQ24DHCCPU-VGのGUI開発支援環境GENWARE3-VGを紹介します。\nグラフィカルな環境で完成イメージを確認しながら開発できるため開発工数の削減に大きく寄与します。\nILC introduces the GUI development support environment DQGENWARE3-VGDQ of the C controller Q24DHCCPU-VG.  DQGENWARE3-VGDQ contributes to reduce development man-hours since a completion image can be checked in the graphical environment with developing a function.

memo: RTOS eT-Kernel and development environment / TRON系RTOS eT-Kernelと開発環境eBinder イーソル(株) ((English)/日本語)
title: RTOS eT-Kernel and development environment / TRON系RTOS eT-Kernelと開発環境eBinder イーソル(株) ((English)/日本語)
description: C言語コントローラ用のTRON系リアルタイムOS eT-KernelとTRONベースシステム開発環境eBinderを紹介します。TRONの開発経験を持つ開発者がC言語コントローラでもその経験を活かせます。\neSOL introduces the TRON series RTOS DQeT-KernelDQ and the TRON base system development environment DQeBinderDQ, compatible with C controllers. Developers with experience of TRON can use their experience efficiently for C controllers.

memo: The Linux development environment / 組み込みLinux開発環境 Lineo uLinux ELITE　リネオソリューションズ株式会社 ((English)/日本語)
title: The Linux development environment / 組み込みLinux開発環境 Lineo uLinux ELITE　リネオソリューションズ株式会社 ((English)/日本語)
description: C言語コントローラQ24DHCCPU-LS用の開発環境Lineo uLinux ELITEの特長と、家の空調制御のデモを紹介します。\nLineo introduces features of the development environment for C controller Q24DHCCPU-LS, DQLineo uLinux ELITEDQ and demonstration of air conditioning control.

memo: PC replacement / パソコンの置き換え ((English)/日本語)
title: PC replacement / パソコンの置き換え ((English)/日本語)
description: パソコンをC言語コントローラに置き換え可能です。複雑な演算処理と制御をC言語コントローラに置き換える事例として、MATLAB/Simulinkによる演算とMELSECの制御で、2液混合によるpHコントロールする動作イメージを紹介します。\nA personal computer can be replaced with a C controller. MITSUBISHI ELECTRIC introduces an operation image to perform two-liquid mixing pH control by calculation with MATLAB/Simulink and MELSEC control as an example of replacing complicated calculation and control with a C controller.

memo: e-F@ctory の紹介 ((English)/日本語)
title: e-F@ctory の紹介 ((English)/日本語)
description: 実際の工場全体（階層別）の模型を使って、製造ラインからのデータ収集による「生産監視」「稼働監視」「品質管理」「予知保全」「トレーサビリティ」などe-F@ctory導入による工場の「みえる化」と、データ収集プラットフォームとしてのC言語コントローラを提案します。\nMITSUBISHI ELECTRIC offers DQvisualizationDQ of factories such as DQproduction monitoringDQ, DQoperation monitoringDQ, DQquality managementDQ, DQpreventive maintenanceDQ, DQtraceabilityDQ, or others that e-f@ctory can achieve and the C controller as a data collection platform.

title: インテル株式会社×三菱電機 IoTを活用した製造現場での障害予知保全 - ESEC2014 (3/8)

memo: 【GX Works3】 検索した場所へ簡単にジャンプ
title: 【GX Works3】 検索した場所へ簡単にジャンプ
description: GX Works3の便利機能、検索した場所へジャンプして移動する機能を紹介します。デバイス等を検索した後、検索前にいた場所に戻ったり、再度検索した場所にジャンプしたりが簡単にできます。

memo: 【GX Works3】 指定した範囲内をまとめて置換
title: 【GX Works3】 指定した範囲内をまとめて置換
description: GX Works3の便利機能、範囲指定しての置換する機能を紹介します。デバイス/ラベルコメントを指定した範囲内でまとめて置換できたり、コメントだけでなくデバイス/ラベル自体の範囲内置換もできます。

memo: 【GX Works3】 複数システム間のシミュレーション
title: 【GX Works3】 複数システム間のシミュレーション
description: GX Works3の便利機能、複数システムをネットワークで繋いで使う時のシミュレーション機能を紹介します。実機を使わなくてもプログラムの動作を確認できます。

memo: 【GX Works3】 プロジェクトファイルの圧縮
title: 【GX Works3】 プロジェクトファイルの圧縮
description: GX Works3の便利機能、プロジェクトファイルの圧縮機能を紹介します。プロジェクトファイルサイズを削減することができます。

memo: 【GX Works3】 Jump to Your Search Result
title: 【GX Works3】 Jump to Your Search Result
description: Let me introduce the useful function of GX Works3 used to jump to your search result. It makes going back to the previous screen and jumping to your search result again after searching for devices easier.

memo: 【GX Works3】 Replace the Data in the Specified Area at Once
title: 【GX Works3】 Replace the Data in the Specified Area at Once
description: Let me introduce the useful function of GX Works3 used to replace the data in the specified area. Not only device and label comments but also devices and labels themselves in the specified area can be replaced in a batch.

memo: 【GX Works3】 Simulation of Multiple Systems
title: 【GX Works3】 Simulation of Multiple Systems
description: Let me introduce the useful function of GX Works3 used to simulate multiple systems connected via a network. The program operation can be checked without using actual machines.

memo: 【GX Works3】 Compressing Project Files
title: 【GX Works3】 Compressing Project Files
description: Let me introduce the useful function of GX Works3 used to compress the project files. The size of the project files can be reduced.

memo: Easily compare waveforms in GX LogViewer. [GX Works3 convenient function video]
title: Easily compare waveforms in GX LogViewer. [GX Works3 convenient function video]
description:
GX LogViewer, one of the convenient functions of GX Works3, will be explained. 

In this video, the process for finding the point of problem occurrence by comparing logging data of abnormal operation and normal operation and displaying device on/off and analog value waveforms is explained. 

Please use this video to help you detect and identify abnormal locations. 

Details can be found here:
https://www.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/fa/products/cnt/plceng/smerit/gx_logviewer/index.html

For details, please refer to the manual. 
The manual can be found here:
Operation manual for GX LogViewer Version 1:
https://dl.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/dl/fa/members/document/manual/plc/sh080887/sh080887al.pdf

*It is necessary to log in as a member on the FA site to download the manual.

memo: Inline ST makes programming easier. [GX Works3 convenient function video]
title: Inline ST makes programming easier. [GX Works3 convenient function video]
description:
Inline ST, one of the convenient functions of GX Works3, will be explained. 

In this video, the effectiveness and operability of programming using inline ST as well as ladder will be explained. 


Please use this video to help you reduce your programming work. 

Details can be found here:
https://www.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/fa/products/cnt/plceng/smerit/gx_works3/gx3go.html
Volume 57: Improved visibility of inline ST:　https://www.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/fa/products/cnt/plceng/smerit/gx_works3/gx3go/0057.html
Volume 37: Defining devices using inline ST:　https://www.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/fa/products/cnt/plceng/smerit/gx_works3/gx3go/0037.html
Volume 35: Easy label registration using inline ST:　https://www.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/fa/products/cnt/plceng/smerit/gx_works3/gx3go/0035.html

For details, please refer to the manual. 
The manual can be found here:
Operation manual for GX Works3:
https://dl.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/dl/fa/members/document/manual/plc/sh081214/sh081214ad.pdf

*It is necessary to log in as a member on the FA site to download the manual.

memo: A short look at the convenient points of offline monitoring [GX Works3 convenient function video]
title: A short look at the convenient points of offline monitoring [GX Works3 convenient function video]
description:
Offline monitoring, one of the convenient functions of GX Works3, will be explained. 

In this video, the process of post-occurrence analysis of the cause of an equipment problem using Mitsubishi Electric’s Camera Recorder Module and the offline monitor function of GX Works3 will be explained. 


Please use this video to help you analyze the cause of a problem after it occurs 

Details can be found here:
https://www.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/fa/products/cnt/plcr/pmerit/sysrecorder/index.html

For details, please refer to the manual. 
The manual can be found here:
https://dl.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/dl/fa/members/document/manual/plc/sh082278/sh082278d.pdf

*It is necessary to log in as a member on the FA site to download the manual.

memo: Flow diagrams show program flow in an easy-to-understand way. [GX Works3 convenient function video]
title: Flow diagrams show program flow in an easy-to-understand way. [GX Works3 convenient function video]
description:
Data flow analysis, one of the convenient functions of GX Works3, will be explained. 

In this video, the data flow analysis function that lets you perform program analysis visually will be explained. 


Please use this video to help you perform program analysis and search for the causes of abnormal operation, etc.. 

Details can be found here:
Special edition Volume 2: Compatible with all models Investigating influences using flow display:
https://www.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/fa/products/cnt/plceng/smerit/gx_works3/gx3go/s002.html#pageUnit01

For details, please refer to the manual. 
The manual can be found here:
Operation manual for GX Works3:
https://dl.mitsubishielectric.co.jp/dl/fa/members/document/manual/plc/sh081214/sh081214ad.pdf

*It is necessary to log in as a member on the FA site to download the manual.

memo: Detection of Disconnected Sensor Cables
title: Detection of Disconnected Sensor Cables
description: Sensor cable breakage detection (Supporting error recovery actions)\nAnyWireASLINK monitors the connected sensor cable for breakage and notifies the programmable controller.\nEven if an input error occurs because of a cable breakage, this function allows the cause and place to be pinpointed immediately and supports early recovery of operation.

memo: Remote Configuration of Sensor Sensitivity
title: Remote Configuration of Sensor Sensitivity
description: Preventive Maintenance … Preventing slight stops (temporary stop of operator)\nAnyWireASLINK can be used to monitor and save the sensor information with the programmable controller, and to change the parameters. Perform “Preventive maintenance” with this function to prevent slight stops before they happen.

memo: Automated Sensor Monitoring
title: Automated Sensor Monitoring
description:
Reducing adjustment man-hours, and traceability
Adjusting the detection level of multiple sensors and recording the sensor values takes a lot of time.
AnyWireASLINK allows the detection level to be set and the setting values to be saved in a batch from a personal computer or HMI.
Realize traceability in the sensor system.

memo: Reducing Device Size with Miniature Terminals
title: Reducing Device Size with Miniature Terminals
description: No relay box (compact size) \nAnyWireASLINK is a miniature terminal capable of branching from a 2-point unit, and is comparable to a relay connector.\nDepending on the installation environment, it is possible to eliminate the relay box and downsize the system.

memo: 4.4.3　デジタルオシロを使った動作確認(MELSEC iQ-Rシリーズ シンプルモーションユニット クイックスタートガイド 15/16(字幕版))
products: サーボシステムコントローラ
title: 4.4.3　デジタルオシロを使った動作確認(MELSEC iQ-Rシリーズ シンプルモーションユニット クイックスタートガイド 15/16(字幕版))
description: MELSEC iQ-Rシリーズ シンプルモーションユニット クイックスタートガイド(L(名)03113)の記載内容の一部を動画化しています。\nクイックスタートガイドと合わせてご覧ください。
